void Tokenizer::SetMakefileFlavor (  )  [inline]

Tokenization differs slightly between ninja files and Makefiles.

By default we tokenize as ninja files; calling this changes to Makefile-style tokenization.

Definition at line 74 of file parsers.h.

References makefile_flavor_.

Referenced by MakefileParser::MakefileParser().
